short_summary: This is a request for a mental health first aid training for Service Canada
description: The request is for a mental health first aid training standard accredited by the Mental Health Commission of Canada. The training aims to equip SC W-T Region employees with the knowledge and skills needed to create a psychologically healthy and safe workplace. The training will provide relevant information and explanations to help a SC W-T Region employee: recognize the signs and symptoms of common mental health problems and gauge their own mental health; provide initial help to a colleague; equip the employee with confidence to engage others and guide a person towards appropriate professional help; and reduce stigma around discussing mental health problems and contributing to a psychologically healthy and safe workplace culture.',
